name: Jungle scene construction 2d game asset pack
name_original: Jungle scene construction 2d game asset pack
description: A huge collection of environmental design 2d game assets and backgrounds for creating lush , detailed jungle scenes. Use the included assets to construct individual and unique levels and backdrops. Useful for all kinds of 2d game development related projects. The included assets are 100% vector so can be used on 4k projects with ease. The included png files have been exported to create a scene approximately 1536 pixels in height. The included game background is fully parallaxing and repeats on both left and right sides.
